DESCRIPTION: Hobbled prevents debuffs and status cards.
Soaked creatures take #b50% more damage from non-attack sources.
If this card is absorbed by another card, provides the bonus effect.
Magic damage ignores block and is not affected by most buffs and debuffs.
When its Mark is triggered, a creature loses HP equal to its Mark.
Intelligence adds additional damage to #yMagic damage.
A card that pops a shard removes the oldest shard from the target.  Most shards have an extra effect when they are popped.
Sigils are unplayable cards whose effects trigger on discarding them.
When an enemy with Frostbite attacks they take damage equal to their Frostbite and reduce Frostbite by 1.
Lose #yBlock equal to Overextend at the end of your turn.
Embed effects are debuffs that are applied an enemy while a #yShard is stuck to them.
A card that becomes attached to an enemy as a debuff when played.
Vitality adds #yBlock to your next blocking card.
If you have haste, gain [E] and draw 1 card at the start of your turn.
Whenever you draw this card, draw another card.

When played, other wave cards in your hand of equal or lower rarity are merged into this one, adding their #yBonus.  Unmerges when it enters your discard pile.  Placed on top of your draw pile after it is played.
Retain your block at the beginning of your next turn.
